dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Relationship Approach
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach building and maintaining relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will pursue new relationships with intensity, seeking to expand their social circle quickly.
Your FarTwin will approach new relationships cautiously, preferring to maintain existing connections and avoid unnecessary risks.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin analyze information and make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems logically, weighing evidence and applying data-driven insights to reach conclusions.
Your FarTwin will make decisions based on instinct and gut feelings, trusting their subconscious to guide them towards the right path.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express themselves through writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will write clearly and efficiently, prioritizing clarity over elaborate language or flourishes.
Your FarTwin will write extensively, providing intricate descriptions and exploring nuances in their writing to convey depth and complexity.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin will engage in innovative and avant-garde creative pursuits, pushing boundaries and challenging norms.
Your FarTwin will adhere to established artistic principles and techniques, respecting the traditions of their craft.

dimensions.label: Media Consumption
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin consume media?

options.description: Your FarTwin will fully engage with media, seeking to be transported and immersed in the story or experience.
Your FarTwin will approach media critically, examining plot, character development, and themes to gain a deeper understanding of the work.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prioritize their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, prioritizing tasks based on urgency and importance.
Your FarTwin will maintain a rigid schedule, adhering to routine and allowing for few deviations or exceptions.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach financial decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and conserving resources, seeking to minimize waste and optimize efficiency.
Your FarTwin will be willing to spend liberally, investing in experiences and acquiring luxury items that bring joy and fulfillment.
